answers.answer: Most likely they'll have you do blood work to see if you have preclempcia.  I was on bed rest till I got my results back which was only 2 days
So if I do have preclempcia they will induce me right away?  Sorry I was taken by surprised so I didn't ask my dr.
What was your BP if you don't mind me asking
Also they may give you steroids then after 24 hrs they may or may not induce or do surgery. It all depends
136/90. And the last appointment 3 weeks ago was kinda high.
My dr. Wants to see wait and see if it goes down and see if I make it go to 37 weeks. But won't know plan till tomorrow

They put me on bed rest when I was 33 weeks with my daughter because of high blood pressure.  They put me on bed rest for the rest of the pregnancy. Induced me at 39 weeks. My BP never went below 160/120

With my first pregnancy I was induced at 36 weeks after being admitted in the hospital after my checkup that day because of my blood pressure. My blood pressure was at 170/110. I later found out that I did have preeclampsia after I had my son. Now I am 27 weeks pregnant with my 2nd son and they are watching me very closely.
Oh and by the way when they first started noticing a pattern with my blood pressure I was put on bed rest at like 30 weeks or so.
Idk your normal bp but that's not crazy high may be you were just excited or stressed. Just relax and keep an eye on how your feeling. And swelling. Hope it all goes well ❤
Thanks ladies for your feedback, let's just hope it is down by tomorrow and stays down.

question: So I went to the doctor today and was told my BP was too high and I'm on bed rest and have to go back tomorrow... I'm 34 weeks. So my question is am I on bed rest till I'm due or just today??? I'm a ftm
title: help not sure...
